section.heading: Misdemeanor insurance fraud.
section.text: A person commits the offense of misdemeanor insurance fraud if that person knowingly engages in conduct specified in § 22-3225.02 with the intent to defraud or to fraudulently obtain property of another.

annotations.annotation: as added July 25, 2006, D.C. Law 16-144, § 2(c), 53 DCR 2838
